name: CharacteristicCodes
title: Possible codes for GroupCharacteristic
description: This CodeSystem contains possible codes that can be used in Group.characteristics

concept.definition: Characteristics with this code constrain the patients expected lifespan
Characteristics with this code constrain observations of the patient
Characteristics with this code constrain procedures undertaken by the patient
Characteristics with this code constrain encounters that the patient took part in
Characteristics with this code define tests the patient must have completed
Characteristics with this code define the consent document the patient must have signed to
